message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start to the game!
You got lucky last round, but I'm not going to let you have it all this time!
Let's find a middle ground, Bob! 45-55 split, fair and square!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a middle ground, Alice...
Time to get serious, Bob! I'm willing to take a slightly bigger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
